author: ahinzmann
body:
Three bug fixes to the definition of the PU jet ID variables. Two affect the behavior on AOD+MiniAOD, and one affects the behavior on MiniAOD (particularly if used with non-standard vertices like in di-photon final states).

The fixes come together with a new training including the fixed definitions. The training has been prepared and will be linked to this PR once uploaded.
title: Bug fixes to PU jet ID variables
